column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 何があったの？
column4: What happened?

column3: そこの人誰？
column4: Who's Tali?

column3: さよなら
column4: Good-bye.

column3: アナタは？
column4: Who are you?

column3: スナザラシラリー？
column4: Sand-seal racing?

column3:
世界中に名の知れた
スナザラシラリーを知らないなんて…
アンタ ほんとに
この世の人間かい？
スナザラシラリーは
スナザラシに乗り決められたアーチを通って
目的地に向かい時間を競い合う
ゲルド族伝統の競技だ！
今は神獣のせいで
何にも出来やしないけどね
column4:
So everyone in the world has heard of
sand-seal racing except you...
Have you been sleeping under a rock?
Sand-seal racing is a sport where people
guide sand seals through arches as they
race toward the finish line.
The racer with the fastest time wins.
It's a true Gerudo tradition!

But because of this blasted Divine Beast,
we can't run a single race right now.

column3:
フューは今苛立ってるんだよ
サインなら後にしてくれるかい？
column4:
Sorry, kid. The great Tali isn't in the
mood to give autographs right now.
Could you come back later?

column3:
ょいと ちょいと！
パフューをそこの人呼ばわりするんじゃないよ！
スナザラシラリー世界チャンピオンの
パフューを知らないのかい？
あの忌々しい神獣さえいなけりゃ
パフューの腕前をみせてやれるんだがね
column4:
"Who's Tali\"? Are you serious right now?


You aren't seriously saying you don't
recognize Tali, the sand-seal racing
champion, are you?
That stupid Divine Beast is the only
thing stopping us from showing you
Tali's sand-seal skills firsthand!

column3:
見りゃわかるだろ？

神獣とやらのおかげで
スナザラシラリーのコースが
使えなくなっちまったんだ

ウロつくのは勝手だが
ヨソでやってほしいもんだよ
column4:
Use your eyes! The Divine Beast is
stomping around, so obviously we can't
use the sand-seal race course.
I suppose you can stand around here if
you want, but I'd prefer you did it
elsewhere.

column3:
このパフューをスナザラシラリーの
世界チャンピオンに育てあげたのは
何を隠そう このアタシなのさ

この子は昔からシャイな子だけどね
アタシだけには心を開いてくれてんだ
column4:
Not to toot my own horn, but I'm the one
who raised Tali into the sand-seal racing
champion she is.
It wasn't easy, let me tell you.
She's always been a bit shy, but her and
I have a great relationship now.
Isn't that right, Tali?

column3:
…っとに あのデカいののお陰で
商売あがったりだよ
column4:
...That big thing out there is seriously
bad for business.

column3:
誰でもいいから さっさとアレを
どうにかしてくれないかねぇ…
column4:
I don't care who does it, but someone
better go address that thing soon...

column3:
ちょいと ちょいと！
パフューをそこの人呼ばわりするんじゃないよ！

あの忌々しい神獣さえいなけりゃ

column3:
たかい？
さっきも言っただろ？
パフューは今苛立ってるんだよ
サインなら後にしてくれるかい？
column4:
gain? I told you earlier, didn't I?


Tali is really annoyed right now.
If you want an autograph, could you
come back later?

column3:
世界中に名の知れた
スナザラシラリーを知らないなんて…
アンタ ほんとに
この世の人間かい？
スナザラシラリーは
スナザラシに乗り決められたアーチを通って

column4:
So everyone in the world has heard of
sand-seal racing except you...
Have you been sleeping under a rock?
Sand-seal racing is a sport where
people guide sand seals through arches
while racing toward the finish line.
The racer with the fastest time wins.
It's a true Gerudo tradition!

But because of this blasted Divine Beast,
we can't run a single race right now.

column3:
アンタらハイリア人にゃ
夜の砂漠の寒さは キツイだろう
アタシたちゃ もう慣れちまったがね
column4:
The frigid temperatures of the desert at
night are pretty rough on you Hylians,
aren't they?
I guess we're all used to it...

column3:
アンタにゃ
昼の砂漠の暑さは キツイだろう
アタシたちゃ もう慣れちまったがね
column4:
The intense heat of the desert during the
day is pretty hard on you, huh.

I guess we're all just used to it...

column3:
まったく アタシの可愛いパフューを
困らせるなんて何がこの地の守り神だよ！
column4:
Who in the blazing sands does this
Divine Beast think it is?! No one upsets
the great Tali and gets away with it!

column3:
まったく アタシの可愛いパフューを
困らせるなんて何がこの地の守り神だよ！
column4:
Who in the blazing sands is this divine
protector that thinks it's so high and
mighty it can upset my adorable Tali?!

column3:
んうん そうだね
わかってるよ パフュー
column4: Yes, yes, right. Understood, Tali.

column3: むっ！
column4: Hrn!
Gah!

column3: のあ！
column4: Nwah!

column3: 不快だ！
column4: N-no! Not good!

column3: なっ！
column4: Wha—?!
